question: You are going away from home for one week and you need to ask your neighbor to look after you house. Write a letter describe:•	Why you want to go away•	What you want your neighbor to look after•	If there are any problems, then give instructions
text: I am writing to you because ı am going to go to  Italy for one week. In this letter, I would like to stay to you my house by the time I came to my home.
two days ago, I went to my company which is very famous, and I argued with my boss about some issues all day, thus I was so angry and I felt nervous, so I decided to go to  Italy because of relaxing.

When ı go to the other country which is very close to Turkey, you have to make something. For example, I have a cat who lives in my house, so you have to give her food each day and control her toilet. In addition, You should give water flowers once a week. you should give its water Friday. it is up to you.
I don't think that there are any issues, but if there are any problems with a cat or other issues you can call me immediately or you can advise my uncle who lives next to  my house.
Finally, When ı come to  Istanbul, you will have already gone to your own home, so ı will give you your lift later.
I look forward to catching up with you soon
